decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - All advertisements displays, and any site used for the display of advertisements shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.
Condition : 5 - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant planning permission.

Condition : 6 - No advertisment shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder, the ready interpretation of any road sign, railway sign or aid to navigation by water or air so as to otherwise render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway ( including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military).
description: Installation of 1 x internally illuminated panel mounted letter/logo (11.8m x 2.112m with capital letters 0.945m high) to elevation of building.
